chunks.chunk_text: But people encountered these very same problems when the first large settlements were being established millennia ago as humans began to swap a nomadic hunter-gatherer existence for a lifestyle centered on farming

chunks.chunk_text: Scientists said on June 17, based on findings from a prehistoric site in south central TurkeyThe researchers examined 742 human skeletons unearthed at the prehistoric ruins of Katalhoyuk inhabited from 9100 to 7950 years ago during a pivotal time in
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 土耳其相關時事趣聞 All about Turkey 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: human evolution for clues about what life was like at one of the earliest sizeable settlements in the archaeological recordAt its peak, 3500 to 8000 people lived there with the researchers calling it a proto-cityThe residents experienced a high rate of infections as seen in their teeth and bones probably caused by
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 土耳其相關時事趣聞 All about Turkey 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: diseases spreading in crowded conditions amid challenges to proper hygieneThe researchers saidOvercrowding may have contributed to interpersonal violenceMany skulls bore evidence of healed fractures to the top or back of the cranium some with multiple injuriesThe shape of these injuries indicates they may have been caused by hard clay balls

chunks.chunk_text: Restoring the glories of Turkey's Ottoman past

chunks.chunk_text: with increased trade and military deploymentsand he raised living standardswith years of unbroken economic growthBut after a failed2016 coupAdelwan embarked on a sweeping crackdownLast year the economy wobbledand the lira plungedsoon after he won re-electionwith even greater powersAs cronyism and authoritarianism
